svc.hero.title: AI-Powered Solutions for Your Business
svc.hero.subtitle: Smart CRM, inventory management, and workflow automation built for small businesses
svc.crm.headline: A CRM Built for Restaurants, Retail & Bars
svc.crm.intro: An AI-powered CRM designed specifically for small businesses that need to track inventory, manage purchases, and handle transactions — all in one place. No bloated enterprise software, just the tools you actually need.
svc.crm.intro2: Whether you run a restaurant tracking ingredients and suppliers, a clothing store managing stock and sales, or a bar handling tabs and inventory — this system adapts to your workflow and uses AI to help you make smarter business decisions.
svc.crm.features.title: What It Does
svc.crm.feat1: Inventory Tracking — Real-time stock levels, low-stock alerts, and supplier management
svc.crm.feat2: Purchase Management — Track orders, vendor invoices, costs, and delivery schedules
svc.crm.feat3: Transaction Handling — Process sales, manage tabs, generate receipts, and track revenue
svc.crm.feat4: AI Insights — Demand forecasting, spending trends, and smart reorder suggestions
svc.crm.industries.title: Built For
svc.crm.ind1.title: Restaurants & Food
svc.crm.ind1.desc: Track ingredients, manage supplier orders, monitor food costs, and reduce waste with AI-powered demand forecasting.
svc.crm.ind2.title: Clothing & Retail
svc.crm.ind2.desc: Manage product catalog, track sizes and variants, handle point-of-sale transactions, and monitor sales trends across seasons.
svc.crm.ind3.title: Bars & Nightlife
svc.crm.ind3.desc: Track drink inventory, manage tabs and transactions, monitor pour costs, and get AI alerts when stock runs low on busy nights.
svc.custom.headline: Need Something Different?
svc.custom.intro: If your business has unique needs that go beyond the standard CRM, I also build fully custom CRM solutions tailored to your specific workflow, industry, and scale.
svc.custom.intro2: From custom dashboards and reporting to integrations with your existing tools — I'll design, develop, and deploy a system that fits your business like a glove.
svc.custom.f1.title: Custom Dashboards
svc.custom.f1.desc: Real-time views designed around the metrics that matter to your business.
svc.custom.f2.title: Third-Party Integrations
svc.custom.f2.desc: Connect to payment processors, accounting software, POS systems, and more.
svc.custom.f3.title: Mobile-Friendly
svc.custom.f3.desc: Manage your business from your phone — check inventory, approve orders, view sales.
svc.custom.f4.title: AI-Powered Reports
svc.custom.f4.desc: Automated summaries, forecasts, and actionable insights delivered to you.
svc.n8n.headline: Automate Everything with n8n
svc.n8n.intro: Beyond the CRM, I build powerful workflow automations using n8n — an open-source automation platform. Use it standalone to connect any tools you already have, or plug it into the CRM to supercharge your operations.
svc.n8n.intro2: Automatically send purchase orders when stock runs low, notify staff on Slack or WhatsApp when a delivery arrives, generate end-of-day reports, sync data with your accounting software — if it can be automated, I can build it.
svc.n8n.examples.title: What You Can Automate
svc.n8n.ex1: Auto-reorder from suppliers when inventory is low
svc.n8n.ex2: Send WhatsApp/SMS confirmations for orders and deliveries
svc.n8n.ex3: Sync transactions with QuickBooks, Xero, or Google Sheets
svc.n8n.ex4: Daily/weekly AI-generated business reports via email or Slack
svc.n8n.ex5: Customer follow-ups and loyalty messaging on autopilot
svc.n8n.ex6: Connect your CRM to any API or third-party service
svc.combo.title: CRM + n8n = Full Autopilot
svc.combo.desc: Combine the CRM AI System with n8n automations for a fully connected business. Track inventory, handle transactions, and let automations take care of reorders, notifications, reports, and customer messaging — all without lifting a finger.
svc.how.title: How It Works
svc.step1.title: Discovery Call
svc.step1.desc: We discuss your business, what you sell, how you track inventory, and what pain points you want solved.
svc.step2.title: Setup & Configure
svc.step2.desc: I set up your CRM with your products, suppliers, and pricing. Plus any n8n automations you need.
svc.step3.title: Train & Launch
svc.step3.desc: I walk you and your team through the system, make sure everyone is comfortable, and we go live.
svc.step4.title: Ongoing Support
svc.step4.desc: I monitor, optimize, and add features as your business grows. You're never on your own.
svc.cta.title: Ready to run your business smarter?
svc.cta.desc: Let's set up the right CRM and automations for your restaurant, store, or bar.
